attributes.action: Affect legislation where Insurance Companies contact local qualified Trades to assist in the renovation of properties after disaster
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
After the flooding of last year in the Hull area, local contractors to which I am one, where never contacted by the Insurance Companies, instead we found that there was an influx of out of town 'Contractors' The insurance companies paid out for shoddy workmanship, unnecessary work, and have been telling their Insured they MUST use their contractors, this is not the case, a person has the freedom of choice, but they are prevented from such a choice.
Therefore, the Prime Minister is requested to introduce a form of legislation that requires Insurance Companies and loss Adjusters to contact local trades in that particular area first as a matter of course.
